typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		EmpID as integer,
		EmpName as string,
		Gender as string,
		Salary as string,
		Dept as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> EmpInfo
EmpInfo sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		SalesOrderID as integer,
		RevisionNumber as integer,
		OrderDate as string,
		SalesOrderNumber as string,
		AccountNumber as string,
		CustomerID as integer,
		TerritoryID as integer,
		BillToAddressID as integer,
		ShipToAddressID as integer,
		ShipMethodID as integer,
		CreditCardID as integer,
		CreditCardApprovalCode as string,
		SubTotal as double,
		TaxAmt as double,
		Freight as double,
		TotalDue as double,
		FreightTax as double,
		TotalWithoutTax as double,
		ConstantValue as string
	),
	format: 'parquet',
	partitionFileNames:['ParquetTest.parquet'],
	umask: 0022,
	preCommands: [],
	postCommands: [],
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	partitionBy('hash', 1)) ~> sink1
